item.title: Instagram Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented local videographer to film occasional sessions of our artist working in their studio. The videos will be used to create awesome content for Instagram.

@danielzimmermanstudio on instagram to see the space

As the videographer, you'll be in charge of capturing high-quality videos that showcase the artist's creative process and unique style. The ideal candidate should have a great eye for detail and be able to work on their own. This is a fantastic opportunity to collaborate with a passionate artist and enhance your portfolio.
  Skills needed:
  - Good at filming and editing videos
  - Knowledge of lighting techniques
  - Familiarity with best practices for creating content on Instagram
  - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

You will need to able to be on site (near the ATL)



Hourly Range: $36.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 00:45 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Content Writing
Skills: Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Content Writing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
